dublin_core.dcvalue: In Kenya, failure to complete the immunization schedule by children who have previously accessed immunization services is an obstacle to ensuring that most children are fully immunized. The MCHIP Program conducted operational research to determine the reasons why children were not attending follow-up immunization appointments.
Lora Shimp, Senior Technical Officer, John Snow, Inc., Email: lshimp@jsi.com
Maternal and Child Health Integrated Program, Kenya

Client education and behavior change communication, Data collection and reporting, Electronic decision support, Provider work planning and scheduling, Registries and vital events tracking, Child health, Immunization
